choose.when: C.user_nick LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR C.cl_title LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' AND C.cl_check = 1

mapper.select: SELECT cl_no, cl_title, cl_sungjang, cl_sang,cl_jangdan, cl_jiwon, cl_check, A.reg_id, A.reg_dt, B.user_nick FROM usercl A, users B WHERE cl_no = #{clNo} AND A.reg_id = B.user_id
mapper.update: MERGE INTO usercl T1 USING ( SELECT #{clNo} AS cl_no, #{clTitle} AS cl_title, #{clSungjang} AS cl_sungjang, #{clSang} AS cl_sang, #{clJangdan} AS cl_jangdan, #{clJiwon} AS cl_jiwon, #{clCheck} AS cl_check, #{regId} AS reg_id FROM dual )T2 ON (T1.cl_no = T2.cl_no) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T1.cl_title = T2.cl_title, T1.cl_sungjang = T2.cl_sungjang, T1.cl_sang = T2.cl_sang, T1.cl_jangdan = T2.cl_jangdan, T1.cl_jiwon = T2.cl_jiwon, T1.cl_check = T2.cl_check, T1.mod_id = T2.reg_id, T1.mod_dt = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (T1.cl_no, T1.cl_title, T1.cl_sungjang, T1.cl_sang, T1.cl_jangdan, T1.cl_jiwon, T1.cl_check, T1.reg_id, T1.reg_dt) VALUES (T2.cl_no, T2.cl_title, T2.cl_sungjang, T2.cl_sang, T2.cl_jangdan, T2.cl_jiwon, T2.cl_check, T2.reg_id, sysdate)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usercl ( cl_no, cl_title, cl_sungjang, cl_sang, cl_jangdan, cl_jiwon, cl_check, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{clNo}, #{clTitle}, #{clSungjang}, #{clSang}, #{clJangdan}, #{clJiwon}, #{clCheck}, #{regId}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE usercl SET cl_title = #{clTitle}, cl_sungjang = #{clSungjang}, cl_sang = #{clSang}, cl_jangdan = #{clJangdan}, cl_jiwon = #{clJiwon}, cl_check = #{clCheck}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_dt = sysdate WHERE cl_no = #{clNo}
